Usage¶

recentlyPlayed(username/id, userplatform (optional) )¶

Shows you your recently played legends.

userplatform is, by default, origin, but you can choose from ‘origin’, ‘xbl’, ‘psn’. username/id is - the desired username to be checked.

` apexStats = apex.recentlyPlayed(your-tracker.gg-api-key) apexPrint = apexStats.recentlyPlayed(username/id) print(apexPrint) >>> ['your', 'last', 'played', 'characters'] `

apex_stats
